    About Junk Store

    Junk Store exists to make non-Steam gaming on the Steam Deck as effortless as native Steam games. We‚Äôre building a unified, intuitive hub where players can install, launch, and manage games from other platforms‚Äîlike Epic and GOG‚Äîright from Game Mode.

    Inspired by the simplicity of platforms like Kodi, our goal is to turn the Steam Deck into an ‚Äúeverything deck.‚Äù One interface. Minimal friction. Maximum access.

    We‚Äôre committed to active development, community feedback, and making it feel like it just works‚Äîbecause gaming should be fun, not frustrating.

    Our Mission

    Junk Store is built to make playing non-Steam games feel as seamless and intuitive as launching native Steam titles.

    • Low-Friction Setup
      No complicated steps‚Äîjust install, launch, and play.

    • Seamless Integration
      Easily add and update games from platforms like Epic Games, Gog and Amazon directly onto your Steam Deck.

    • User-Friendly Interface
      Navigate your library easily and discover new titles without the hassle.

    • Active Development
      We‚Äôre constantly improving Junk Store with regular updates and new features based on your feedback.
